title: Game-mode concept: hide and go teemo
body:
This gamemode is a 9v1, upon entering champ select 1 player is randomly chosen to be the teemo, the other 9 just load in, the player that got given teemo goes through a ban phase of 3 champs once all champs are banned and the other team has picked there 9 champs the game loads up on crystal scar

rules
no stealth revealing champs (immediately banned off and made unable to be selected)
stealth revealing items can be used
first team to 30 kills (teemo needs 15, the other team need 30)
game is to end after 25 minutes of play 
winner to be decided by the most kills

Buffs - nerfs
Teemo has 30% increase on all stats (upon leveling ult each level up of ult 10/20/30% increase)

Edit
added rule - winner to be decided by the most kills at the end of 25 minutes

Ashe, shaco, fiddle, hecurim... being teemo would suck

One problem with the game is that there can be a huge variance in game length because if the was teemo particularly good at hiding and the enemy team was bad then the game could go for excessive amounts of time and it becomes annoying for everyone.
The inverse of that is also not so satisfying for the teemo because if you're doing bad it may not be very fun to die 30 times in a row.
